channel.title: Help with this please :)
channel.description:
Ok. download scar and put bumis's auto fighter for rsc, i copy and pasted it into scar, went to ran and i get 1 error and that error says
"identifier expected in script"
Could someone please tell me what i have to put there?
P.S im new to scar :)

item.title: Help with this please :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:12, topic:68856”][quote author=Click Here link=topic=100953.msg1028385#msg1028385 date=1174340772]
kk here is a pic


[/quote]
Remove all words in line 1. The Program New; should be after the { and }.
I have never heard of begin program before. So remove that, the guy might just be talking about a procedure.

You may need to ask some other scripters or try posting the entire script or linking me to it.

I may then fix it up, thanks.[/quote]

If you paste a script in the default Program New; begin end. then it will appear like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this please :)
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“Click Here, post:5, topic:68856”] begin program BumisFormsFighterCrack;

then it says at the bottom

line 1: [error] (1:26) identifier expected in script[/quote]

Line 1 is probably the Program Name. The identifier is a semicolon. It probably expects a semicolon ( after the Program Name;

So it would probably be like this (Example 1):

Program New

Which should be like (Example 2):

Program New;.

If it is already like Example 2 please post the entire script or upload it to MoparIsTheBest for me to have a look and other scripters too.

Read full topic
